name: Recyclable Materials
description: Items that can be processed and reused, including paper, cardboard, glass, certain plastics, and metals

name: Hazardous Waste
description: Materials that pose a risk to human health or the environment and require special handling and disposal, including certain chemicals, medical waste, and some e-waste

name: Organic Waste
description: Biodegradable materials of plant or animal origin, including food scraps and garden waste

name: Electronic Waste
description: Discarded electronic devices and components, often containing both valuable and hazardous materials

name: Medical Waste
description: "Wastes emanating primarily from human and veterinary hospitals
column3: clinics and surgeries. They have the ability to affect and infect other living organics

name: Sludge
description: "A semi-solid by product of wastewater treatment that can be used beneficially or require disposal."
